ProductInfo.Features:
380 TV line video resolution. Camera Lens: 6.0mm. Wireless frequency: 2.4 GHz
Built-in Microphone and Audio Circuit. Audio range: 9ft/3m
Weather resistant aluminum housing for indoor and outdoor use
Up to 165 ft wireless transmission and 27 IR LEDs up to 26 feet in night vision
Package included: 1 x CMOS Camera, 1 x Wireless Receiver, 2 x Power Supplies (1 for Camera, 1 for Receiver), 1 RCA Jack Video/Audio Cable
